activities: The Datavote Hub contains Business Contact Information about individuals, including an individual’s name, title, company, work phone number, work email address, and work address that is listed in the Datavote Hub.  Business Contacts may add themselves to the Datavote Hub, and Datavote may, from time-to-time, supplement the Datavote Hub with publicly available Business Contact and Company Information or with Business Contact and Company Information from trusted data providers.  DataVote uses this information to rate the currency and accuracy of Business Contact Information on behalf of its customers.  We do not sell or share the information we collect in the DataVote Hub.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
